text: Varieties of goods and produces. Price wise sometimes need to check to make sure it's not over priced. Sometimes it does as I experienced it before. But generally, NTUC fair price. :)....üëç..

Anyhow pack items into my recycle bag and say is full and ask me want to buy plastic a not. In the end packed myself and get everything in. Such attitude won‚Äôt happen in Sheng Siong, duno why most ntuc aunties are so menapause? Should have gone to nearby Sheng Siong instead.

Weekends are busier but only one cashier counter on the outside. Thankfully the lady cleared pretty fast so waiting is good as older people can't stand in line longer than expected with trollys. Two staffs will be better suggestion one inside one outside. What you think.

I understand its the Chinese New Year therefore the store would not be able to get stocks as frequent to maintain its freshness. However, planning of stocking dry goods is as important as fresh goods. Most shelves are empty and its affecting the shopping experience. Inventory could be improve.

The staff is friendly and customer centred. They respond to customer's feedback with a smile. The middle management here has a good balance between the welfare of the staff and the store's customers . Kudos to the staff serving the community.
